example.parse: (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS استولت) (NP-SBJ (NOUN_PROP+CASE_DEF_NOM اسرائيل)) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN سفينة)) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (ADJ.VN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN محملة) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الاسلحة))))))))))
